definition.schema:
schema  { query: Query }

type Continent { code: ID!
  countries: [Country!]!
  name: String!
}

type Country { capital: String
  code: ID!
  continent: Continent!
  currency: String
  emoji: String!
  emojiU: String!
  languages: [Language!]!
  name: String!
  native: String!
  phone: String!
  states: [State!]!
}

type Language { code: ID!
  name: String
  native: String
  rtl: Boolean!
}

type Query { continent(code: ID!): Continent
  countries(filter: CountryFilterInput): [Country!]!
  languages(filter: LanguageFilterInput): [Language!]!
}

type State { code: String
  country: Country!
  name: String!
}

input CountryFilterInput {code: StringQueryOperatorInput
  continent: StringQueryOperatorInput
  currency: StringQueryOperatorInput
}

input LanguageFilterInput {code: StringQueryOperatorInput
}

input StringQueryOperatorInput {eq: String
  glob: String
  in: [String]
  ne: String
  nin: [String]
  regex: String
}
